description: A court rules that "Judensau" image can stay on the facade of a Wittenberg church linked to Luther.
title: Anti-Semitic sculpture to remain on German church
title_page: Anti-Semitic sculpture to remain on German church - BBC News
maintext: The court found that while the sculpture would be offensive if viewed in isolation, "in the context in which it has been placed by the church it has lost its insulting character", according to spokesman Henning Haberland.
